name: All-In-One Planner: A Notion Template
description: Why use multiple templates when you can have everything in one place? This all-in-one template includes daily logs, habit tracking, to-do lists, project & goals, notifications, and so much more all in one convenient location.Begin your day by using the Notion Daily Log to generate a Daily Card, providing an overview of your daily planning information. Review your recurring to-dos, challenges, habits, projects, goals, and agenda. Throughout the day, mark off each completed task to track your
features: An easy way to track daily challenges, goals & projects; Daily Cards (see your day at a glance); Daily Logs and Reminders; Week/Month/Year (at a glance); Master To-do's Database (with use of Notion recurring function)Create recurring task, events, daily challenges, birthdays, habits, list, routines and anything else you may possibly need; Create recurring task, events, daily challenges, birthdays, habits, list, routines and anything else you may possibly need; SmartTags Database, automatically count completed daily to-do's (including Notions use of the recurring database)  in any category you create; Weekly Reflections; Health Goals Database; Sleep Tracker
